product_name: Leki Cristallo Antishock Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: Made from tough aluminum and a smooth edgeless grip, this reliable trekking pole holds firm under pressure and absorbs shock for lasting comfort on even the most rugged backcountry terrain.
